rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. This book is a translation of Extaze: een boek van geluk, first published in 1892 and also available in Project Gutenberg. Note that the division in chapters and sections of this translation deviates from the Dutch original. Scans of this work are available in the Internet Archive (copy 1, 2, 3).
